ğŸ“Š Intelligent Item Tracking: The extension keeps track of all items it has encountered in your current Wishlist, even as you navigate through multiple pages.

ğŸ“± Responsive Design: Adapts to different screen sizes, ensuring optimal display on both desktop and mobile devices.

ğŸ–¨ï¸ Print-Friendly: The total price display is automatically hidden when printing, preventing any overlap with Wishlist content.

ğŸ”’ Privacy-Focused: Works entirely on the client-side, ensuring your Wishlist data remains private and secure.
